title: COMPUTER ENGINEERING TECHNOLOGY
de_requirements:
1. Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes to include Mathematics or Statistics.
  2. NCE credit in relevant subjects.
utme_requirements:
1. Mathematics.
  2. English Language.
  3. Any three (3) subjects from Statistics, Physics, Chemistry, Further Geography, and Economics.
